articles.author: Michelle Gumede, Mogomotsi Magome
articles.title: How tiny Lesotho ended up with the highest US tariffs in the world - AP News
articles.description: U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs have struck among others the small southern African kingdom of Lesotho, one of the world's poorest nations. Trump announced a 50% tariff on Lesotho, the highest among all countries. It will hit hard Lesotho's textile manu…
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG (AP) If you have ever bought a pair of jeans from an American brand like Levis or Wrangler, chances are they were manufactured at a factory in the small southern African nation of Lesoth… [+2455 chars]
